mapper.select: SELECT exhibitNum,exhibitName,TO_CHAR(exhibitStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitStart,content,host,supervise,admitStart,admitEnd,ratingName, TO_CHAR(exhibitEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exhibitEnd, hallName, exHallLocate, exProfileImage,genre, CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(exhibitEnd,'YYYYMMDD')||' '||admitEnd,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')<SYSDATE THEN '마감' WHEN content IS NULL THEN '예정' ELSE '예매하기' END AS bookableState FROM EXHIBIT e JOIN exhibitHall h ON e.hallNum=h.hallNum JOIN rating h ON e.ratingNum=h.ratingNum WHERE exhibitNum=#{num}
SELECT audience||' '||exprice priceString FROM EXHIBITprice ep JOIN AUDIENCELEVEL al ON ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM = al.AUDIENCELEVELNUM WHERE ep.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} ORDER BY ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE exhibit SET content=#{content} WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exhibitInterest WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM exhibitInterest WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} AND userId=#{userId}
SELECT hallName, hallNum, exHallLocate, exHallImage FROM exhibitHall WHERE hallNum=#{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE exhibitHall SET exHallImage=#{exHallImage} WHERE hallNum=#{hallNum}
mapper.select: SELECT exreviewNum, subject, content, score FROM exreview WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE exreview SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, score=#{score} WHERE exreviewNum=#{exreviewNum}
mapper.select: SELECT ep.exhibitNum, ep.audienceLevelNum, audience, exPrice FROM exhibitPrice ep JOIN audienceLevel al ON ep.audienceLevelNum=al.audienceLevelNum JOIN exhibit e ON ep.exhibitNum=e.exhibitNum WHERE ep.exhibitNum=#{num} ORDER BY ep.audienceLevelNum ASC
